This course is for BMUS and BA - Music Majors and Minors. For prospective BA Music Majors and Minors ONLY: to register, e-mail music.advisor@ubc.ca Select MUSC 200 lecture + one tutorial.

description: Harmonic and linear functions of common chromatic chords; mixture; chords and progressions of linear origin; tonal plans. Compositional and analytical exercises.
